<<<<<<< HEAD
Lux in tenebris. Or, A clavis to the Treasury in Broad-Street. Fauntleroy, Thomas.
[2], 17, [1] p.
Printed for Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleet-Street, London, : 1654. [i.e. 1653]
Signed at end: Tho. Fauntleroy. Thomason received his copy in November 1653. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Fauntleroy"; "Nou. 29. 1653."; 4 in imprint date crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

[2], 17, [1] p.
Printed for Francis Tyton at the three Daggers in Fleet-Street, London, : 1654. [i.e. 1653]
Signed at end: Tho. Fauntleroy. Thomason received his copy in November 1653. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Fauntleroy"; "Nou. 29. 1653."; 4 in imprint date crossed out. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Francis Tyton
the three Daggers in Fleet-Street
